feed.subtitle: I like creating and using specialized tools for making development processes as efficient as possible. I have the experience to work with big projects and big development teams.

author.name: Gurpreet Singh
author.description: I like creating and using specialized tools for making development processes as efficient as possible. I have the experience to work with big projects and big development teams.
author.creator: @gsin11

gears.title: Apple MacBook Pro 2021 (14")
gears.details: This is my personal coding computer. Processor M1 Pro Chip, 8-Core CPU, 16-Core GPU, 16 GB RAM, 512 GB SSD.

gears.title: Keychron K2 (US layout)
gears.details: Hot-Swap Mechanical Bluetooth Keyboard (Mac) with Keycap/Gateron Brown Switch/USB C, Compact Wireless RGB.

gears.title: Logitech MX Anywhere 3 (Mac)
gears.details: A perfect mouse with zero lag in doing daily work with 4000 DPI sensor, customizable buttons, USB-C, Bluetooth

gears.title: Bose QC 35II Headphones
gears.details: My goto headphones, I am using them on my iPhone, Mac, sometimes with my LG TV ;)

gears.title: SAMSUNG Odyssey G5 (27")
gears.details: A perfect 2K HDR Curved Gaming monitor with active AMD FreeSync (144 Hz), I am using it for gaming (with PS5).

gears.title: TitanWolf Mate
gears.details: Nice mate which compliments to my workspace.
